resources.string: Please allow access to internal storage to read and write internal storage data and management data.
You can not run the application until permission to access internal storage is granted.

Please follow the steps below to allow "All File Access" to access the storage.

 0.Click the "ALL FILE ACCESS PERMISSION" button at the bottom of the screen.
 1.Tap "SMBExplorer" on the "All File Access" permissions screen that appears.
 2.Tap the switch on the right side of the screen.
 3.Make sure that the switch on the right side of the screen turns blue.
 4. Return to the application screen with the back key
You cannot launch the app until "All File Access" is allowed. If you want to allow it, please start the app again.
